markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs=""
>
[Storming Breath](/Feats.aspx?ID=3782) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Gatewalkers</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Deviant" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=426" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Gatewalkers Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=190) pg. 9, [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 100

</column>

---

You spit out a freezing breath or sonic scream. You deal 4d6 damage, plus 1d6 damage for every level you have beyond 6th, to all creatures in a 30-foot cone, with a [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save.
name: Storming Breath
